name: The Silicon Shadow
description:
A catastrophe has occurred at Safe Side station the A.I, M.I.N.D, turned against humanity and only a few humans remain there. Discover the truth about the downfall of the station and unscrupulous acts of its residents in this short length game.
Use your glide boots to slide around at high speed and avoid the gunfire of the aggressive machines and fight back with your selection of four weapons. Use your grappling hook to traverse the vertical environments and make your way through platforming challenges.
Explore the early 1900’s retro futuristic space station filled with dark atmosphere and murderous robots.
Estimated play time is 25-45 minutes.
